summary: The National Nuclear Security Administration relies on contractor employees to carry out its missions. NNSA is now allowed to reimburse certain contractors for some transportation services for their employees—which may address employees' commuting issues like traffic safety and congestion at work sites. This Q&A looks at how NNSA is putting this into action. Specifically, NNSA is reviewing a contractor's plans to offer park-and-ride shuttles and...
title: National Nuclear Security Administration: Information on Implementation of Contractor Commuting Authority
